resources.string:
If you meet the grade requirements specific to your category, youâ€™ll be allowed to enter your program of study in second year. We call that entering POSt (Program of Study). 

If you make POSt, you will officially be in your desired program and will be allowed to continue until you graduate or elect to change programs. 

If you do not meet minimum requirements in your first year, you will not be allowed to make POSt and will have to select a different program to switch to in your second year.
Which PoSt Are You Trying to Make?
Please Enter Your Achieved/Expected Marks in the Following Courses:
MATA31 - Calculus I for Mathematical Sciences
MATA22 - Linear Algebra I for Mathematical Sciences
MATA37 - Calculus II for Mathematical Sciences
CSCA48 - Introduction to Computer Science II
CSCA08 - Introduction to Computer Science I
Congratulations, you have met POSt requirement!
Unfortunately, you do not meet POSt requirement
For the Machine Learning and Data Science stream only: a final grade of at least B in CSCA48H3

Admission will be based on academic performance in the required A-level courses. The admission requirements change each year depending on available spaces and the pool of eligible applicants, and students are cautioned that there is no guarantee of admission; as such, students are strongly advised to plan to enroll in backup programs.
Please enter a mark for all the listed courses
Please enter a mark between 0 and 100
